He explained on a forthcoming episode of` Oprah Presents Master Class': I asked a very successful guy,` What's the best advice you can give me?' and he said,` Simon Cowell , always know when to leave the fair.' And I think that's good advice. Something inside you just says,` You know what, it's time to go.' Without any regrets whatsoever. domineering former US defense secretary- the late Robert McNamara - who came to describe the Vietnam War as`` terribly wrong.''`` That's not the case with Iraq,'' Donald Rumsfeld said. I think the world's a better place with[ former Iraqi president] Saddam Hussein gone and with the Taliban gone and the al-Qaeda out of Afghanistan, he said, adding that the President Bush administration's decision to invade Iraq in the wake of the Sept. 11 attacks on the US was`` incremental,'' not rushed.
